name: Sanguine Mutants
author: Bloodbat
description: A collection of modules based on Mutable Instruments Eurorack devices and their variants.

modules.name: Funes
modules.description: Powerful, polyphonic macro oscillator based on Mutable Instruments' Plaits 1.2

modules.name: Sanguine Mutants Blank
modules.description: Rack sleekerizer: add the Mutants goblin and a glowing Mutants logo to your rack!

modules.name: Apices
modules.description: Versatile complement to any patch, based on Mutable Instruments' Peaks

modules.name: Aleae
modules.description: Pair of polyphonic Bernoully gates based on Mutable Instruments' Branches

modules.name: Nodi
modules.description: Adaptable, polyphonic macro oscillator based on Mutable Instruments' Braids

modules.name: Contextus
modules.description: Multipurpose, polyphonic macro oscillator based on the Renaissance alternative firmware for Mutable Instruments' Braids

modules.name: Nebulae
modules.description: Texture synthesizer based on the Monsoon version of Mutable Instruments' Clouds

modules.name: Etesia
modules.description: Texture synthesizer based on the Parasite firmware for Mutable Instruments' Clouds

modules.name: Mortuus
modules.description: All-around gap filler based on the Dead Man's Catch firmware, with some additions, for Mutable Instruments' Peaks.

modules.name: Fluctus
modules.description: Texture synthesizer based on the Kammerl Beat-Repeat firmware for Mutable Instruments' Clouds

modules.name: Incurvationes
modules.description: Polyphonic meta modulator based on Mutable Instruments' Warps

modules.name: Distortiones
modules.description: Doctored, flexible and fully polyphonic meta-modulator based on the Parasite alternative firmware for Mutable Instruments' Warps

modules.name: Mutuus
modules.description: Experimental, polyphonic and multifaceted meta-modulator based on the Symbiote firmware for Mutable Instruments' Warps

modules.name: Explorator
modules.description: Polyphonic multiple, mixer, noise source, sample and hold, inverter, rectifier and logic unit, based on Mutable Instruments' Links and Kinks

modules.name: Marmora
modules.description: Random sampler based on Mutable Instruments' Marbles

modules.name: Anuli
modules.description: Polyphonic resonator based on Mutable Instruments' Rings

modules.name: Velamina
modules.description: Tetrad of voltage controller amplifiers based on the revised Veils from Mutable Instruments

modules.name: Aestus
modules.description: Modulator based on Mutable Instruments' Tides

modules.name: Temulenti
modules.description: Multifaceted modulator based on the Parasite firmware for Mutable Instruments' Tides

modules.name: Vimina
modules.description: Polyphonic dual clock divider, multiplier and swinger based on the Twigs firmware for Mutable Instruments' Branches.
